TopicTitle: Orbital Velocity killed out of nowhere

Articles.Content:
so i put up a small station, it has the stockalike station parts, Tac life support, and waste thingys, kosmos small panels, and a stockcrew tank. Then i make an Resupply clipper, for tac. i launch it get to 100km orbit, match planes, intercept, when i get within 2.5km, the loading range,the stations orbital velocity drops to zero, and it plummets to kerbin.heres my gamedata

http://drswagboss.imgur.com/all/

its the first 3

btw,i had the interstellar lite pack until the full .12 came out, i removed all the conflicts i think. also had FAR, but removed it temporarily to figure out why my rockets snap when i start my gravity turns
